snippet.title: Aliens: Neoplasma Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the 2019 ZX Spectrum game, Aliens: Neoplasma. There are two endings to this game, a bad and good ending. Both walkthroughs are shown in this video. The bad ending is first, and the good ending walkthrough starts at 27:00 . More info. and download here: http://zx-dev-mia-remakes.proboards.com/thread/29/alien-neoplasma

From the recording originally sent by Pavel Plíva to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get into difficulty, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Aliens
